events.name: Battery Production Network Evolution
events.wd_description: The increasing role of electricity as an energy carrier in decarbonising supply chains, and how this tension is mediated by existing geographies of production, drives the configuration of the LiB production network.
events.description: The increasing role of electricity as an energy carrier in decarbonising supply chains, and how this tension is mediated by existing geographies of production, drives the configuration of the LiB production network.

events.name: Battery Recycling Methods
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Battery Recycling Methods (Pyrometallurgical)
events.wd_description: Pyrometallurgy employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Pyrometallurgy employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
